(Bonus Health: +@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_BriarHealthFed@ Health)

Gain <TFTBonus>[ 400 / 525 / 2500 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> shield for 4 seconds and summon a swarm of [ 8 / 8 / 30 ] bats. They seek out the 4 closest enemies within 3 hexes and deal <magicDamage>[ 150 / 225 / 2000 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage each. Bats deal true damage to enemies below 33% Health.
ability.name: My Lovely Pets

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and summon a swarm of @NumberOfBats@ bats. They seek out the @NumTargets@ closest enemies within 3 hexes and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage each. Bats deal true damage to enemies below @EnemyPercentHealthThreshold*100@% Health.
Launch [ 10 / 10 / 99 ] arcane blasts at random enemies that each deal <magicDamage>[ 220 / 330 / 777 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> damage.
ability.name: Eye of the Magus

ability.desc: Launch @NumberOfBlasts@ arcane blasts at random enemies that each deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> damage.

Throw [ 2 / 2 / 8 ] completed items to allies with open slots. If an ally has no room for items, they instead gain a stacking 12% Damage Amp for the rest of combat. Then, throw [ 3 / 3 / 8 ] knick-knacks at enemies that each deal [ 333 / 500 / 1000 ] (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

Occasionally, also finds something special in the backpack.
ability.name: Knick-Knack Attack

ability.desc:
Throw @NumItems@ completed items to allies with open slots. If an ally has no room for items, they instead gain a stacking @DamageMod*100@% Damage Amp for the rest of combat. Then, throw @NumEnemies@ knick-knacks at enemies that each deal @MagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

Occasionally, also finds something special in the backpack.

Launch a ball at the current target that explodes for <magicDamage>[ 180 / 270 / 1000 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage, and colors the area for [ 5 / 5 / 15 ] seconds, dealing <magicDamage>[ 500 / 750 / 3000 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over the duration. If the ball lands in an area that is already colored, it will bounce to a new location within 2-hexes before exploding.
ability.name: Portalpalooza

ability.desc: Launch a ball at the current target that explodes for <magicDamage>@MagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage, and colors the area for @DOTDuration@ seconds, dealing <magicDamage>@DOTDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over the duration. If the ball lands in an area that is already colored, it will bounce to a new location within 2-hexes before exploding.

Sneeze fire at the target, dealing [ 240 / 360 / 550 ] (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.

Dragon Upgrade: Instead sneeze dragonfire in a larger area. Dragonfire deals [ 290 / 435 / 663 ] (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.
ability.name: Fiery Sneeze

ability.desc:
Sneeze fire at the target, dealing @SpellDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.

Dragon Upgrade: Instead sneeze dragonfire in a larger area. Dragonfire deals @UpgradeSpellDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.

Fire a supernova at the largest clump of enemies within Attack Range plus 1 hexes that deals <physicalDamage>[ 239 / 364 / 1145 ] (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the target and adjacent enemies. It explodes into a cluster of fireballs, each dealing <physicalDamage>[ 120 / 182 / 573 ] (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.
ability.name: Hail of Hellfire

ability.desc: Fire a supernova at the largest clump of enemies within Attack Range plus 1 hexes that deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the target and adjacent enemies. It explodes into a cluster of fireballs, each dealing <physicalDamage>@ClusterDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.

Steal <scaleLevel>[ 300 / 480 / 5000 ]</scaleLevel> Health split between the nearest [ 3 / 4 / 10 ] enemies. Each cast after heals <scaleHealth>[ 250 / 300 / 900 ]</scaleHealth> (%i:scaleAP%) Health and deals <physicalDamage>[ 165 / 297 / 610 ] (%i:scaleHealth%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the target instead.
ability.name: Hellhound

ability.desc: Steal <scaleLevel>@FlatHealthSteal@</scaleLevel> Health split between the nearest @NumEnemies@ enemies. Each cast after heals <scaleHealth>@ModifiedAttackHealAmount@</scaleHealth> (%i:scaleAP%) Health and deals <physicalDamage>@EmpoweredDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the target instead.

Dash to the farthest enemy within 3 hexes, dealing <physicalDamage>[ 138 / 206 / 328 ] (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to them. The next 3 attacks launch kunai at the target, dealing <physicalDamage>[ 104 / 156 / 256 ] (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> damage.
ability.name: Fire Point Strike

ability.desc: Dash to the farthest enemy within @DashHexRange@ hexes, dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDashDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to them. The next @NumAttacks@ attacks launch kunai at the target, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalAutoDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> damage.

Gain <scaleLevel>[ 55 / 60 / 90 ]%</scaleLevel> (%i:scaleAP%) Durability for 4 seconds and attract nearby enemy projectiles. At the end, release a nova that deals <magicDamage>[ 110 / 165 / 1200 ] (%i:scaleMR%)</magicDamage> magic damage in a [ 2 / 2 / 3 ] hex range.
ability.name: All Eyes on Me

ability.desc: Gain <scaleLevel>@ModifiedDamageReduction@</scaleLevel> (%i:scaleAP%) Durability for @Duration@ seconds and attract nearby enemy projectiles. At the end, release a nova that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleMR%)</magicDamage> magic damage in a @DamageHexAOE@ hex range.

Reduce incoming damage by [ 20 / 25 / 30 ] (%i:scaleAP%) for 4 seconds. Fire two magic bolts that converge on the furthest enemy within 3 hexes, Stunning them for [ 1.25 / 1.25 / 1.5 ] seconds. Each bolt deals [ 50 / 75 / 115 ] (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies it passes through.

Mage casts will target a different enemy.
ability.name: Convergence

ability.desc:
Reduce incoming damage by @ModifiedDamageReduction@ (%i:scaleAP%) for @DRDuration@ seconds. Fire two magic bolts that converge on the furthest enemy within @HexRange@ hexes, Stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds. Each bolt deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies it passes through.

Mage casts will target a different enemy.

Launch a ball at the current target that explodes for <magicDamage>[ 150 / 200 / 3000 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage, and colors the area for 4 seconds, dealing <magicDamage>[ 6 / 9 / 200 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over the duration. If the ball lands in an area that is already colored, it will bounce to a new location within 2-hexes before exploding.
ability.name: Friends Forever!

ability.desc: Launch a ball at the current target that explodes for <magicDamage>@MagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage, and colors the area for @DOTDuration@ seconds, dealing <magicDamage>@DOTDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over the duration. If the ball lands in an area that is already colored, it will bounce to a new location within 2-hexes before exploding.
Deal <magicDamage>250 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and adjacent enemies, <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> them for 1.25 seconds.
ability.name: Elder Slam

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and adjacent enemies, <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

Passive: On arrival, Stun all adjacent enemies for 2 seconds.

Active: Deal 150 (%i:scaleAP%) to the target and all adjacent enemies. For the next 4 seconds, attacks chain lightning 2 times to nearby enemies, dealing 75 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
ability.name: Earthquake

ability.desc:
Passive: On arrival, Stun all adjacent enemies for @StunDuration@ seconds.

Active: Deal @ModifiedSlamDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) to the target and all adjacent enemies. For the next @SpellDuration@ seconds, attacks chain lightning @NumChains@ times to nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedLightningDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

Passive: On arrival, Stun all enemies within 2 hexes. Every 3 attacks will chain lightning 4 times to nearby enemies. Lightning deals 85 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

Active: Deal 340 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies near the target. Then, gain 40% Attack Speed for 4 seconds.
ability.name: Sky Splitter

ability.desc:
Passive: On arrival, Stun all enemies within @StunHexRange@ hexes. Every @NumAttacksToZap@ attacks will chain lightning @NumChains@ times to nearby enemies. Lightning deals @ModifiedPassiveDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

Active: Deal @ModifiedActiveDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies near the target. Then, gain @ASRatio*100@% Attack Speed for @ASDuration@ seconds.

Gain <scaleLevel>[ 35 / 40 / 50 ]% (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleLevel> Durability for 3 seconds. Create 3 volcanic ruptures under the closest enemies which <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> for 1.5 seconds and deal <magicDamage>[ 120 / 180 / 300 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Subsequent ruptures on the same enemy are 50% effective.
ability.name: Twilight Eruption

ability.desc: Gain <scaleLevel>@ModifiedDamageReduction@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleLevel> Durability for @DamageReductionDuration@ seconds. Create @NumTargets@ volcanic ruptures under the closest enemies which <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> for @KnockupDuration@ seconds and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedFlameDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Subsequent ruptures on the same enemy are @ReducedDamage*100@% effective.

Transform into dragon form and gain an aura that deals [ 58 / 84 / 136 ] (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage per second to adjacent enemies. Then fly through the largest group of enemies within 2 hexes and Stun them for [ 1 / 1 / 1.25 ] seconds.

Dragon Upgrade: Double the size of the aura. It deals 30% more damage.
ability.name: Dragon's Descent

ability.desc:
Transform into dragon form and gain an aura that deals @TotalDamagePerSecond@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage per second to adjacent enemies. Then fly through the largest group of enemies within @HexRange@ hexes and Stun them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

Dragon Upgrade: Double the size of the aura. It deals @DragonPercentDamageIncrease*100@% more damage.
Gain <TFTBonus>[ 275 / 300 / 325 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 3 seconds. Then, wallop the target for <physicalDamage>[ 238 / 356 / 534 ] (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.
ability.name: Clean-Up Duty

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds. Then, wallop the target for <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.

For 3 seconds, gain [ 30 / 30 / 35 ]% (%i:scaleAP%) Durability and create a cone of flame that deals [ 220 / 330 / 515 ] (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage over the duration and Wounds enemies for 5 seconds.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%
ability.name: Hot-Tea

ability.desc:
For @Duration@ seconds, gain @ModifiedDamageReduction@ (%i:scaleAP%) Durability and create a cone of flame that deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage over the duration and Wounds enemies for @BurnDuration@ seconds.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

Throw a bouncing bomb at the farthest enemy. The bomb explodes on the first enemy hit dealing <magicDamage>[ 200 / 300 / 450 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and <magicDamage>[ 100 / 150 / 225 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> to all nearby enemies.
ability.name: Bouncing Bee

ability.desc: Throw a bouncing bomb at the farthest enemy. The bomb explodes on the first enemy hit dealing <magicDamage>@MagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> to all nearby enemies.

Transform, gaining [ 300 / 375 / 450 ] (%i:scaleAP%) max Health. While transformed, deal [ 20 / 30 / 50 ] (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes every second.

If already transformed, gain [ 180 / 230 / 280 ] (%i:scaleAP%) additional max Health and increase the damage by [ 10 / 15 / 25 ] (%i:scaleAP%).
ability.name: Blizzard

ability.desc:
Transform, gaining @ModifiedInitialHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%) max Health. While transformed, deal @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes every second.

If already transformed, gain @ModifiedSecondaryHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%) additional max Health and increase the damage by @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%).

Passive: Gain 15% bonus Ability Power from all sources.

Active: Fire an orb towards the target dealing [ 140 / 210 / 325 ] (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. After hitting an enemy it returns, dealing [ 90 / 135 / 210 ] (%i:scaleAP%) true damage.
ability.name: Orb of Perception

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain @BonusAPRatio*100@% bonus Ability Power from all sources.

Active: Fire an orb towards the target dealing @ModifiedOrbDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. After hitting an enemy it returns, dealing @ModifiedTrueDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) true damage.

Call down a star on the target that deals <magicDamage>[ 200 / 300 / 450 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies then heals a nearby ally for <scaleHealth>[ 120 / 140 / 180 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>.
ability.name: Starfall

ability.desc: Call down a star on the target that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies then heals a nearby ally for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>.

Passive: On arrival, Stun all enemies within @StunHexRange@ hexes. Every @NumAttacksToZap@ attacks will chain lightning @NumChains@ times to nearby enemies. Lightning deals @ModifiedPassiveDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

Active: Deal @ModifiedActiveDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies near the target. Then, gain @ASRatio*100@% Attack Speed for @ASDuration@ seconds.

Active: Deal @ModifiedActiveDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies near the target. Then, gain @ASRatio*100@% Attack Speed for @ASDuration@ seconds.
Fires a soundwave towards the longest line of enemies that deals <magicDamage>[ 220 / 330 / 495 ] (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage, reduced by 35% for each enemy hit.
ability.name: Sharp Note

ability.desc: Fires a soundwave towards the longest line of enemies that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage, reduced by @DamageMod*100@% for each enemy hit.

Passive: Every 4 attacks and when changing targets, leap at the target and deal [ 120 / 180 / 591 ] (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target and adjacent enemies.

Active: For the next 5 seconds, gain [ 90 / 100 / 300 ]% Attack Speed, 15% (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp, and crowd control immunity.
ability.name: Ragnarok

ability.desc:
Passive: Every @AttacksToSlam@ attacks and when changing targets, leap at the target and deal @SlamDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target and adjacent enemies.

Active: For the next @Duration@ seconds, gain @ModifiedAttackSpeed@ Attack Speed, @ModifiedOmnivamp@% (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp, and crowd control immunity.
On death deal <magicDamage>[ 0 / 0 / 600 ]-[ 0 / 0 / 800 ]</magicDamage> magic damage (based on current Stage)  to enemies within [ 0 / 0 / 1 ] hexes.

ability.desc: On death deal <magicDamage>@ExplosionDamageFloor@-@ExplosionDamageCeiling@</magicDamage> magic damage (based on current Stage)  to enemies within @ExplosionRadiusInHexes@ hexes.

Combat Start: Gain 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Lose 1 of each every second.

Active: Spin, gaining [ 380 / 460 / 550 ] (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds and dealing a total of [ 141 / 186 / 267 ] (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) physical damage to each adjacent enemy.

ability.desc:
Combat Start: Gain @BonusArmorMR@ Armor and Magic Resist. Lose @ArmorMRLossPerSecond@ of each every second.

Active: Spin, gaining @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and dealing a total of @SpellDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) physical damage to each adjacent enemy.
Every 3 seconds, deal <trueDamage>10%</trueDamage> max Health true damage to the 2 nearest enemies within 3 hexes.
ability.name: Lightning Strike

ability.desc: Every @LightningInterval@ seconds, deal <trueDamage>@MaxHealthDamage@%</trueDamage> max Health true damage to the @NumEnemies@ nearest enemies within @Range@ hexes.
